items.sentence: I think Tom was supposed to do that by himself.
Tom was lucky he didn\'t get seriously injured.
Tom seems to be really worried about something.
Tom seems to be very concerned about something.
Please feel free to eat anything in the fridge.
Please leave a message on my answering machine.
Please meet me in front of the station at 2:30.
Please spend a few minutes thinking about this.
I don\'t think Tom knows everybody\'s name yet.
I want to know why you weren\'t at the meeting.
I want you all to know that I\'ll never change.
She couldn\'t convince him to accept the bribe.
She doesn\'t like to leave anything unfinished.
Tom finished his coffee and asked for a refill.
Tom fixed the roof of his house just yesterday.
Tom folded the paper before handing it to Mary.
Tom forgot the anniversary of their first date.
Tom forgot to lock the front door when he left.
Tom forgot to take his medication this morning.
Tom\'s mother would\'ve been very proud of him.
